title: Neemias Queta posts career highs in points and rebounds in Celtics loss to Timberwolves
author: Colin McCarthy
bullets: Boston Celtics Queta scored 19 points and had 18 rebounds matching up against Rudy Gobert on Saturday night.
Neemias Queta had the best game of his NBA career on Saturday night.
(AP Photo/Lily Dozier) Neemias Queta had somewhat of a slow start to his first season as a starting center, but his development over the last few weeks has been a positive for the middling Celtics.

title: Judge says more women can join lawsuit over hidden camera in John Hancock locker room
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News A secret camera was stashed in the locker room ceiling of the former John Hancock headquarters in Boston’s Seaport.
Seven women who were spied on in a John Hancock locker room got the green light to join a lawsuit against the company six years after the voyeurism took place.

title: Typo for Olivia Dean’s TD Garden show has fans up in arms
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Fans were fuming after tickets to Olivia Dean’s August 2026 TD Garden show were priced at a whopping $753.
Olivia Dean performs onstage during the 2025 ARIA Awards at Hordern Pavilion on November 19, 2025 in Sydney, Australia.
(Photo by Mark Metcalfe/Getty Images) An alleged Ticketmaster typo had fans boiling after an upcoming Olivia Dean concert at Boston’s TD Garden was priced more than 14 times the actual ticket cost.

title: Jaylen Brown, Derrick White appear on Celtics’ injury report ahead of Timberwolves game
